body: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1.Cast Crimson Mage What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Crimson Mage's casting cost is R when the card is printed as 1R What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? 1.23 Please provide any additional information below.
author: [djl...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/106540123595614438785/)
title: Crimson Mage's Casting Cost

comments.body:
Thanks for reporting the bug. This was reported in issue 169 and fixed in revision f8eb582547e6 , which will be part of release 1.24 coming out later this month.

**Status:** Duplicate  
  **Mergedinto:** 169
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
